quiz.question: Cut Line (empty selection)
quiz.note: Cut the current line or selected text

quiz.question: Copy Line (empty selection)
quiz.note: Copy the current line or selected text

quiz.question: Replace
quiz.note: Replace text in the current file

quiz.question: Find Next
quiz.note: Find the next occurrence of the current search input

quiz.question: Find Previous
quiz.note: Find the previous occurrence of the current search input
